task: Develop a basic 'Rummy' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Lowest common denominator check - single beat - single note - single riff'.
name: Riff Rummy

branding_data.short_description: Riff Rummy is a unique twist on classic Rummy, incorporating musical elements and minimalist strategies.
branding_data.detailed_description: Riff Rummy combines the traditional card game of Rummy with an innovative musical twist. Players aim to form sets and runs of cards while also creating simple musical riffs that correspond to their moves. The game emphasizes minimalism, encouraging players to focus on the 'single beat' or 'single riff' strategy. This unique approach requires players to think both strategically and creatively, as they balance their card combinations with musical improvisation. The game is designed for both card game enthusiasts and music lovers, offering a fresh take on a classic game.

strategy: Lowest common denominator check - single beat - single note - single riff
